benchmark_details.name: MORQA (Medical Open-Response QA)
benchmark_details.overview: MORQA is a new multilingual benchmark designed to assess the effectiveness of NLG evaluation metrics across three medical visual and text-based QA datasets in English and Chinese, featuring 2-4+ gold-standard answers authored by medical professionals, along with expert human ratings.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation benchmark for assessing NLG methods in medical contexts and highlight the effectiveness of LLMs as evaluators.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Sample size is limited, and evaluations may not fully represent all expert judgments.

data.source: DermaVQA, WoundcareVQA, LiveQA, and MedDialog datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated comparing responses against expert judgments.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate correlation with expert judgments and assessment of output quality.
methodology.baseline_results: Traditional metrics tend to underperform compared to LLM-based evaluations.
methodology.validation: Cross-validation across multiple datasets and human expert evaluations.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: All newly created data has been approved for public release and research use.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Expert annotators provided informed consent prior to task initiation.
